name: Lufthansa Business Class A380
description:
Enjoy the luxury of the Lufthansa A380 Business Class on this flight review - flying from Singapore to Frankfurt and on to San Francisco. 

This flight review cover the Lufhansa business class seat and A380 cabin.  I also feature Singapore's Changi Airport, the SilverKris Lounge, boarding, take off and the Lufthansa business class service including inflight dining, amenities kit and seat that converts into a fully flat bed.  

For more flight reviews including British Airways, Qantas, Emirates, Cathay Pacific, Etihad, Turkish Airlines, LATAM and Baltic Air please check out my channel. 

Coming Soon:  

American Airlines A319 Business Class
United Airlines 787 Polaris Business Class
Emirates A380 First Class
Etihad A380 First Class Apartment

Flight 1:   Singapore to Frankfurt  LH779
When:    July 2017
Aircraft:  Airbus A380-800   registration DAIMJ
Seat:       19K

Flight 2:   Frankfurt to San Francisco  LH454
When:    July 2017
Aircraft:  Airbus A380-800   registration DAIML
Seat:       20K

Camera:  Sony FDR-AXP55
